title: Generate a target to run a Ngrok tunnel for a local server.
description: Generate a target to run a Ngrok tunnel for a local server.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use to invoke the command?

project.x-prompt: What project does the target belong to?

serverTarget.description: Server target to run tunnel for.

protocol.description: The tunnel protocol name. This defines the type of tunnel you would like to start.

address.description: Forward traffic to this local port number or network address.

subdomain.description: Subdomain name to request. If unspecified, ngrok provides a unique subdomain based on your account type.

region.description: Choose the region where the ngrok agent will connect to host its tunnels.
